question:
Arrange chronologically the following Peshwas according to their year of succession in the Maratha empire
1. Balaji Biswanath
2. Balaji Bajirao
3. Bajirao I
4. Madhavrao
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The tenure of the Peshwas- Balaji Biswanath (1713-20), Bajiirao I (1720-40), Balaji Bajirao (1740-61), Madhavrao (1761-72), Narayanrao (1772-73), Raghunathrao (1773-74), Sawai Madhavrao (1774-95), Bajirao II (1796-1818).
